attributes.action: Send ALL refugees home to sort out their own problems, withdraw our forces
attributes.additional_details: The blatant truth is we don't want to be colonialists again, ruling foreign peoples, but we can never help these people as equals, what ever we do will be thrown back at us as it has been in the past. Better help them sort their own lives locally, let them fight, let them decide, offer our knowledge, experience but not our bodies. Refugees.. rubbish, if all they wanted was safety there are a lot closer countries with similar cultures, climates than treking across Europe, its all money.
attributes.background: Rather than us looking after people so fit they can walk across Europe for a better life AND us paying for the pleasure to do so, let them sort out their own countries issues, Yes some will die BUT they must develop themselves, create their own society, offer advice & help not our soldiers lives

rejection.details:
It's not quite clear to us what you would like the UK Government or Parliament to do.

There are already petitions on the site calling for immigration to stop, or calling for all non-British citizens to be deported.

The UK Government and Parliament don't control what people do if they have been refused entry to Britain or deported.
